resources.string: Problem with internet quotes is that you can\'t always depend on thier accuracy.
Age is not important unless you\'re a cheese.
Because of their size, parents may be difficult to discipline properly.
Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
Abraham Lincoln was the 16th U.S. president and died over 100 years before the internet existed.
Helen Hayes won an Emmy, a Grammy, an Oscar, and a Tony award.
P.J. O\'Rourke was born in Toledo, OH.
Confucius was an influential Chinese philosopher, teacher and political figure.
From 1928 to 1947, Walt Disney was the voice of Mickey Mouse.
Inspirational image of mountains or kittens and such
